overview.tax_residency_rules: 183-day presence rule or main center of vital interests.
overview.currency_exchange_rules: Free flow of capital and no currency controls.

personal_income_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Yes, unless exempt under Double Taxation Agreements.
personal_income_tax.social_security: 7.8% of gross income (shared between employer and employee).

corporate_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Yes, unless exempt under Double Taxation Agreements.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Exemptions for gains from the sale of primary residence, assets held for more than 12 years.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Proof of remote employment, minimum income of €3,500 per month.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: 50% tax exemption on employment income for the first 10 years.

special_economic_zones.name: Cyprus Investment Programme
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Fast-track citizenship, tax benefits for investors.
special_economic_zones.business_types: Investment in real estate, businesses, or infrastructure.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income, but not capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income, but not capital gains.

additional_notes.political_risks: Low political risk, stable economy and legal system.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Strong economic growth and low unemployment.
additional_notes.legal_system: Based on English common law, efficient and transparent.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 53rd in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
